{{Wireless embedded system |brand=ASUS |model=RT-AC3100 |revision=(4.07) |series=AC3100 |upc=889349052150 |ean=0889349052150 |asin=B01707HPKS |newegg=N82E16833320245 |price=280 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Arcadyan |manuf_model=WG911AA |manuf_rev=AC44 -ASU |availability=now |est_release_date=10/22/2015 |fcc_date=05/29/2015 |fcc_id=MSQ-RTGW00 |ic_id=3568A-RTGW00 |type=wireless router |pwr_v=19 |pwr_amp=2.37 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM47094 |cpu1_cspeed=1.4 GHz |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=ESMT |fla1_model=F59L1G81LA-25T |ram1=512 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5CC256M16DP-DI |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, USB 3.0 |expansion_usb_num=2 |jtag=yes,, 5-pin header,, unpopulated |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, populated,, internal,, 3.3V TTL |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM4366 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL, RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=4 |wi1_rxchains=4 |wi1_sstreams=4 |wi2_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi2_chip1_model=BCM4366 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL, RP-SMA |wi2_txchains=4 |wi2_rxchains=4 |wi2_sstreams=4 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=4 |wan_speed=1GbE |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=2.4GHz RF Power Amplifier Module;Skyworks;SE2623L;;4;,,, 2.4GHz SPDT switch w/ LNA;Skyworks;SKY85201-11;;4;,,, 5GHz RF Power Amplifier Module;Skyworks;SKY85405;;4;,,, 5GHz SPDT switch w/ LNA;Skyworks;SKY85605-11;;4; |flags=MU-MIMO, NitroQAM, Link Aggregation, AiMesh, DFS (master), VHT80+80, DFS (master), DFS (slave) |stock_boot=CFE |stock_os=Linux |tp_firmware=Asuswrt-Merlin, FreshTomato |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid=ASUS, ASUS_5 |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=AC:9E:17 |oui_eth=AC:9E:17 }}
:• '''2167''' Mbps max PHY rate per each 80MHz wide 5GHz channel, :• '''1000''' Mbps max. PHY rate for the 40MHz wide 2.4GHz channel = '''''AC3100'' class'''
{{TagLine|AC3100 Dual-Band Wi-Fi Gigabit Router}} :{{ProductPage|https://www.asus.com/Networking/RT-AC3100/}} {{SupportPage|vendor=ASUS|model=RT-AC3100}} "RT-AC3100 REV 4.07" and "1519" is silkscreened on the main board. DFS certification and VHT80+80 support were added with a C2PC request on 3/6/2019. :Actual support would probably need to come from a firmware update. The first page of the DFS Test Report lists two manufacturers: [[Askey]] and [[Compal]]. *Differences between the three models covered by this FCC certification :are described in the DFS Test Report as follows: {| class="wikitable" ! style="text-align:left;"| Model ! LAN port ! Heatsink color |- |[[ASUS RT-AC88U|RT-AC88U]] |8 LAN ports |Silver, Red |- |[[ASUS RT-AC3100|RT-AC3100]] |4 LAN ports |Silver, Black |- |[[ASUS RT-AC88R|RT-AC88R]] |8 LAN ports |Silver, Red |} * Web GUI: http://router.asus.com {{see also|ASUS RT-AC88U|Arcadyan}} ===Features=== *Ultra-fast 802.11ac Wi-Fi router with a combined dual-band data rate of 3167 Mbps :for low latency online gaming, smooth 4K streaming and extremely fast file-sharing *Broadcom NitroQAM technology boosts 5 GHz data rates :up to 2167 Mbps and 2.4 GHz up to 1000 Mbps *4x4 antenna design with AiRadar universal beamforming for wireless :signal coverage exceeding 465m² (around 5000 square feet) *1.4 GHz dual-core processor improves USB and WAN/LAN speed *Link aggregation supports close to 2 Gbps wired transmission :for more devices to enjoy faster access speed *Up to 4X capacity Wi-Fi with revolutionary MU-MIMO technology *Parental Controls let you manage your family’s web activity :and ensure a safe environment for younger users *AiProtection for total security and privacy ===Specifications=== *CPU: [[Broadcom]] [http://www.broadcom.com/products/Wireless-LAN/802.11-Wireless-LAN-Solutions/BCM47094 BCM47094] @1.4GHz (''ARM Cortex-A9'') *Flash: 128 MB (NAND), RAM: 512 MB (DDR3) *Wi-Fi: 4x4 MU-MIMO, NitroQAM, Dual Band, 2.4/5 GHz *WLAN: 2x [[Broadcom]] [http://www.broadcom.com/products/Wireless-LAN/802.11-Wireless-LAN-Solutions/BCM4366 BCM4366] SoC 4T4R 802.11abgn/ac *PA: 4x ''[[Skyworks]]'' SE2623L (2.4GHz), 4x ''[[Skyworks]]'' SKY85405 (5GHz) *Antenna: 4x detachable Dual Band 5dBi antennas *Switch: int. [[Broadcom]] BCM47094 *Ports: 1x WAN (GbE), 4x LAN (GbE) *USB: 1x USB 3.0, 1x USB 2.0 *Applications: ASUSWRT, AiCloud, AiProtection, DLNA server, :VPN server, Download Master, Guest Network, High-Power mode, :Static IP, Automatic IP, PPPoE (MPPE support), PPTP, L2TP, IPv4, IPv6 ===Forum threads=== *[http://www.snbforums.com/threads/rt-ac3100.27717/ ''ASUS RT-AC3100'' on '''SNB''' forums] *[http://www.snbforums.com/threads/maylyn-networking-asus-rt-ac88u.27534/ ''ASUS RT-AC88U'' on '''SNB''' forums] *[http://www.snbforums.com/threads/asus-rt-ac5300-leak.23606/ ''ASUS RT-AC5300'' on '''SNB''' forums] ===Misc=== *[http://www.broadcom.com/press/release.php?id=s889428 PR on '''Broadcom'''] *[http://www.anandtech.com/show/8862/quantenna-maintains-80211ac-technology-lead-as-broadcom-and-marvell-launch-new-chipsets PR on '''AnandTech'''] __NOTOC__
